contexts.context: An unfortunate <mark>tax</mark> revolt in Balmora was put down after significant property damage and...
...disturbances might spread to Ald'ruhn if the heavy burden of Imperial <mark>taxes</mark> were not alleviated.
A minor <mark>tax</mark> revolt in Balmora was suppressed without undue harm to life and...
...deputations to the Duke to express their concerns over the high <mark>tax</mark> rates and the injurious effect of high tariffs on trade....
